title: A Chain on a Peg

children.value:
A heavy uniform chain hangs over a small smooth peg with equal lengths 
$\vari{a}$
 on each side. Masses 
$\vari{m}$
 and 
$\vari{3m}$
 are attached to the two ends, and the system is released from rest.

Prove, by the principle of conservation of energy, that the mass 
$\vari{m}$
 reaches the peg with velocity 
$\vari{\sqrt {ga}}$
, whatever the mass of the chain may be.
